content.raw:
In the proposed implementation, the Wind instance is handled by the World instance and there is no interaction between the PhysicsEngine and the Wind instances directly. The Wind instance only interacts with physics::Entity.

The Wind instance could be moved inside the PhysicsEngine instance. This would mean that to access the Wind instance, one would have to access the PhysicsEngine instance first. And, to be consistent, the wind properties should be moved inside the physics properties in gzclient. I am not sure which solution would be preferable.
